hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Muhammad bin Yusuf] berkata, telah menceritakan kepada kami [Sufyan] dari [Zaid bin Aslam] dari ['Atha' bin Yasar] dari [Ibnu 'Abbas] berkata, "Nabi shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam berwudlu' sekali sekali

chapter.eng-name: The washing of the body parts (i.e., the parts which are washed in ablution) once only while performing ablution
